title: ransom campaigns
extract: Definition of ransom (Entry 2 of 3) transitive verb. 1 : to deliver especially from sin or its penalty. 2 : to free from captivity or punishment by paying a price.
extract_html: Definition of ransom (Entry 2 of 3) transitive verb. 1 : to deliver especially from sin or its penalty. 2 : to free from captivity or punishment by paying a price.
